lead_paragraph: Three-time French Open champion and former No. 1-ranked tennis player Gustavo Kuerten has some simple advice for athletes considering skipping the Rio de Janeiro Olympics in his home country.

headline.print_headline: Tennis Star Kuerten's Advice to Nervous Athletes: Go to Rio
headline.main: Tennis Star Kuerten's Advice to Nervous Athletes: Go to Rio

snippet: Three-time French Open champion and former No. 1-ranked tennis player Gustavo Kuerten has some simple advice for athletes considering skipping the Rio de Janeiro Olympics in his home country....
